content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Wang, let's start with the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in renting the apartment, but I need a fair price. I'm looking to pay around 800 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is not within my budget. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Would 900 Euros be more acceptable to you?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is still not high enough. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How about 1000 Euros per month? I believe this is a fair price considering the location and amenities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is still not high enough. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. Would 1100 Euros be more in line with your expectations? This is a newly built apartment in the city center, after all.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is closer to my expectations. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt, I'm willing to go up to 1200 Euros per month. This is a very generous offer, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. Please let me know if this meets your requirements.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1300] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
